title: Deconstructing the transfer market: Making sense of the big deals and top trends of ‘silly season’
content:
Climber carnage at Ineos Grenadiers, more heft behind Pogačar, questions over Evenepoel, Cavendish, and all the other nuggets to know.

Read the full article at Deconstructing the transfer market: Making sense of the big deals and top trends of ‘silly season’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
